p: A recent single arm study performed on 20 COVID-19 patients shows that the use of hydroxychloroquine also by adding the antibacterial drug azithromycin is efficient in viral load reduction/disappearance [ 16]. Hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine's antiviral activity appears to be due to the increase in endosomal ph which is crucial for virus-cell fusion [ 17, 18]. Azithromycin, in addition to inhibiting the protein synthesis of bacteria, is able to mitigate inflammation and modulate the immune system [ 19, 20].
